file_content.text: I knew it would be you. Did Jari beg you to "save me"?
Jedi are rats. Stomp on one, and another comes scuttling back in.
Jari was a loyal comrade who fought by your side.
That "rat" was your ally.
And tortured me with his constant, goody-two-shoes sniveling.
Tell me where the First Son is, or what he's planning, and I'll ask the Republic for clemency.
Help me, and I'll help you.
You think I need to ask for mercy?
My forces have taken your walkers apart.
And I brought friends.
Just a setback. I'll still be standing when the First Son returns.
I know what you did to Blaesus, and Geland, and Sophia Farash. I'm not losing Guardian Hold Six to a monster like you.
The Council understands what was done to you--there may be some way to stop it.
The Jedi can help you.
No thanks. The First Son himself called me to battle. I won't go back to being some Jedi's sidekick.
I took no pleasure in it. They forced my hand.
Those deaths were unfortunate.
Lucky for me, I get to enjoy my duties.
You're the one who turned on your friend, then slaughtered your own men.
Me? What about your crimes?
Simple survival. If they were no threat, I let them go. You didn't give the other Children any such courtesy.
Took me a while to find the master startup code, but it was worth it. This is for my brothers and sisters.
